about.name: Ashwin Raj
about.shortInfo: A passionate Software Engineer building impactful solutions.
about.longInfo: I am a dedicated and detail-oriented software engineer with 10 of experience in designing, developing, and deploying robust software solutions. Proficient in a wide range of technologies, including [list a few key skills like JavaScript, Python, and React], I specialize in creating scalable, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. My passion lies in continuously learning and staying at the forefront of emerging technologies, allowing me to bring innovative ideas to every project. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy tackling complex challenges to deliver high-quality results. In my spare time, I contribute to open-source projects and enhance my skills through personal development initiatives.
